title: Pro player try to scam me with account sale
body: A pro player in challenger series, whose name I know, told me he would give me a diamond 5 account for 70$. I naively trusted him and he scammed me took the money on paypal and didnt give me the account. So I want to let Riot know his name so he doesn't play in professional anymore. What proof and information do you need Riot? I have chat logs from his account and discord chat log and paypal showing his name and emails. I dont want to give my information from my main account though because I dont want it to be banned. Will I be exempt from being banned for account buying for giving this information if i give the chat logs with his account?

replies.body: Isn't it your fault for trying to buy a account? You don't go to the police if your drug dealer scams you with fake weed.

it is 2 wrongs done but his wrong is illegal, he is a prominent member of the league community, and i know his name. Ok so u think i wont tell riot paypal and even legal authorities if i have to to get even? I have plenty of evidence and a paper trail so he will pay.

Well shit, that's not good. ,:(

Let's get your account resecured again first. Our friends in Account Recovery will look into it; just ticket them over [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)!

Any other questions regarding the scam and reporting the player can also be brought up there, but I want to make sure your stuff is safe first. In the future, try not to make any deals or trades with players like that. If you're ever suspicious or want some tips to stay safe, refer to [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720-Phishing-Don-t-take-the-bait) :J

My account is completely secure and not boosted. But i had a conversation on that account with dlwodd aka yuan qi or boyuan qin the eunited mid laner negotiating a duo q boost to diamond or him selling me an account that i would like to give to riot without them banning my account. Make sense? I know what i discussed and considered was wrong but is there a way to report the person without being banned also?
I can't help you with a report on Boards, but when you write in the ticket, those specialists will take that information into account on top of making sure the rest of your stuff is safe too.
